definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: When the bell rang, I bolted from the schoolhouse.
sentences.chinese: 鈴響了，我衝出了教學樓。

sentences.english: The question whether we'll build another lecture building hasn't been settled.
sentences.chinese: 是否要另建一幢教學樓的問題還未決定。

sentences.english: Agreeable center road's going toward is a teaching building before.
sentences.chinese: 令人愉快的中心路的往前走以前是教學樓。

sentences.english: The library stands in front of the teaching building and faces the gardon.
sentences.chinese: 圖書館的前面是花園，後面是教學樓。

sentences.english: Come and see, behind our teaching building, there are some small pear trees covered with white flowers;
sentences.chinese: 請來瞧一瞧，教學樓後，小梨樹上掛滿了白花。

sentences.english: In front of the teaching building are many students' bikes.
sentences.chinese: 在教學樓前停放着許多學生的自行車。

sentences.english: The new teaching building adds to the beauty of Sanxia Senior High Middle School.
sentences.chinese: 新教學樓的落成使三峽高中變得更美麗。

sentences.english: Move forward, you will see the building, which is where the students attend classes.
sentences.chinese: 往前走，你就看到了教學樓，那是同學們上課的地方。

sentences.english: 87% of enrolled students attend classes in environmentally efficient school buildings.
sentences.chinese: 87%的在冊學生在環境友好型教學樓中上課。

sentences.english: The Teaching buildings and student's building are very new.
sentences.chinese: 教學樓和學生住宿樓相當的新。

sentences.english: Sun`s back to parking his car in front of the teaching building.
sentences.chinese: 孫重新把車停在教學樓前面了。

sentences.english: Coming into the gate, you can see the tall teaching building in the middle of the school.
sentences.chinese: 進了大門，你可以看到學校中央高大的教學樓。

sentences.english: Simulation of a nine-school teaching building elevator systems.
sentences.chinese: 模擬某校九層教學樓的電梯系統。

sentences.english: I can see us sitting in the pavilion down stairs the teaching building.
sentences.chinese: 我似乎可以看見我和他坐在教學樓下的小亭子裏。

sentences.english: The school building is equipped with a lot of fire extinguishers.
sentences.chinese: 教學樓配備了許多滅火器。

sentences.english: Both are reinforced concrete structures linking to an existing school block.
sentences.chinese: 這兩棟樓均是鋼筋混凝土結構，並與現有教學樓相連。

definition: a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
